scripts.test:e2e:ci: npm --prefix functions ci && npm --prefix functions run build && npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx firebase-tools@15.7.0 emulators:exec --project prispevkyrodicu "node scripts/seedEmulator.mjs && VITE_E2E=true VITE_USE_EMULATORS=true npm run build && VITE_E2E=true VITE_USE_EMULATORS=true npx start-server-and-test 'npm run preview -- --host 127.0.0.1 --port 4173 --strictPort' http://127.0.0.1:4173 'PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4173 npm run test:e2e'"
